name: Arrow Clicker (Colored Pixels)
description:
Click the arrow, buy upgrades and collect arrows

Gameplay

Click the Arrow and earn money. With this you can Buy Upgrades and earn more money. If you own at least one object of a type you can press the button on the right to reverse the production of this type. Thereby this counts negative to your score and you will increase the production of this type every minute.

Controls
  • s - save
  • l -load
  • left mouse Button - Click

Save / load does not work for the web version

Made for the Clicker Jam Spring 2023
